title: Chromebook
body: IS there any way i can play LoL on Chromebook?

replies.body: Chromebook is kind of a glorified Chrome browser, and won't be able to play LoL.  There isn't an installation or[ system requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)  that supports it.  I wouldn't recommend it!
But... when Riot releases a Browser-based minigame, you'd be set!
